subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Ottawa Senators traded the disgruntled wing Dany Heatley to the San Jose Sharks, ending a lingering dispute with a player who said he felt he was not being used properly by the team. The Sharks gave up Milan Michalek, Jonathan Cheechoo and a second-round pick. Ottawa also sent a fifth-round pick to San Jose.
